attributes.action: Stop the DVLA introducing number plates being fitted with electronic tags.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DVLA is considering forcing all the UK's 1.3 million motorcycles to be fitted with plates featuring electronic tags, which are currently being trialled.

In my opinion innocent Motorcycle riders speed and positions could be tracked by authorities.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the DVLA introducing number plates being fitted with electronic tags."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
